achievements.description: Score a kill with your equipped primary, secondary and melee weapons in 5 seconds or less.

achievements.name: The 8-fold Path
achievements.description: Squad must survive 8 waves of Defense using only Melee Attacks.

achievements.name: The Camera Adds 10 Pounds
achievements.description: Destroy 150 Security Cameras.
